author: andschwa
body:
Specifically this is `Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.Native.dll`, which is blocking DSC work (barring our work-around using `omicli`).

VSO create date - 6/3/2015 15:46:00

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @FawcettJohnW Is this still an issue, or are we going to abandon this and use OMI from here on out?

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I think _this_ is the umbrella issue you're working under.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @johnkord I believe this is the umbrella issue you're working on, assigning appropriately.

comments.author: paulcallen
comments.body: This looks like the same issue as #550. Closing this one.

title: Expose the Management.Infrastructure API
